product_name: MSR WhisperLite Shaker Jet Backpacking Stove
long_description: The ever-popular MSR WhisperLite stove features a self-cleaning shaker jet to reduce soot build-up and stove maintenance. Clean the jet with an easy shake-a weighted pin inside the jet pushes away any debris or soot to reduce maintenance. Runs on white gas for maximum heat output and excellent cold-weather use; requires priming. Legs fold out to provide a stable base and fold down to store compactly. Durable metal fuel line keeps fuel bottle away from stove for ease of use and safety. Totally field maintainable-every stove part is designed to be taken apart and be easily replaced in the field, including the fuel pump. Includes windscreen and heat reflector for increased operating performance; also includes a durable, lightweight MSR fuel pump. Windscreen is designed to accommodate cookware up to 10 in. in diameter. Use the MSR WhisperLite stove only with MSR fuel bottles, sold separately. Weight of liquid fuel stove includes only stove and fuel pump.
short_description: The ever-popular MSR WhisperLite stove features a self-cleaning shaker jet to reduce soot build-up and stove maintenance.
